import styles from './main.module.scss' import Carousel from './Carousel' import { RowBookList } from 'components/RowBookList' import { bestSeller } from 'data/bestSeller' import SearchForm from '../../components/SearchForm' import GNB from 'routes/_shared/GNB' import cx from 'classnames' import { useState } from 'react' import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import { getSearchListApi } from 'services/bookSearchApi' import { useRecoilValue } from 'recoil' import { inputValue } from 'states/inputValue' const Main = () => { const [isSearchShow, setIsSearchShow] = useState(false) const input = useRecoilValue(inputValue) const { data } = useQuery( ['getSearchListApi', input], () => getSearchListApi(input).then((res) => { console.log(res) }), { enabled: !!input, staleTime: 2 * 60 * 1000, } ) return (
  • 최근 검색어
) } export default Main
